about_the_game:
Sex monsters - the DLC name is already speaking of itself. It includes very cool sex monsters, dozens undressable male and female monsters ready for having sex in your game. Some of them are naked and some are partially dressed, but you can remove all their clothes. Using different settings, you can create perfect sex monsters and manage them according to your wishes. You will give them orders where they should go and what they have to do. You will decide with whom they will have sex today.

All monsters have working genitals with a lot of different settings. Also, you can change the size of body, make it thin or thick, make an athletic or huge, manage the erection of penis on male characters and set up female's vaginas, clitoris and anuses, boob's size according to your needs.

Try those cool sex monsters one by one to see which one you like most of all. They can have sex with each other, as DLC include both male and female characters, or they can have sex with other characters included in the main game and in the other DLC.

Just imagine how cool it could be. You can put as many couples having sex in the room as you want, so you can create your own intergalactically sex club on your station and make all your NPC to have sex together in the way you want.

You will get:

Arcturian
Chimp female
Chimp male
Cyclops
Demon
Exo alien female
Exo alien male
Foxxy
Gimple
Gnom female
Gnom male
Goblin female
Goblin male
Goblin
Grommock
Grugmart orc
Kitty
Mega demon
Ogre
Orc
Oso corgi female
Oso corgi male
Sasquatch female
Sasquatch male
Shroom
Sidra
Teddy bear
Tree spirit
Troll
Vic monster
Werwulf
Zombie female
Zombie male
Licker head

You can use all characters from Sex monsters DLC as main character or as NPC

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you can add new characters on scene and in the NPC menu you can give them commands.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

Please post images, ideas, notes and suggestions regarding the 18+ content in the Telegram group "bestpcgamesforfun" (You can find link to it, on the right side as "Visit the website"), because Steam does not allow public discussions of any 18+ content.

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC users can make the characters completely naked. Characters have working genitals.

Sex monsters - the DLC name is already speaking of itself. It includes very cool sex monsters, dozens undressable male and female monsters ready for having sex in your game. Some of them are naked and some are partially dressed, but you can remove all their clothes. Using different settings, you can create perfect sex monsters and manage them according to your wishes. You will give them orders where they should go and what they have to do. You will decide with whom they will have sex today.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Sex monsters for Sci-fi builder - additional very cool customizable male and female monsters of different kinds and sizes ready for having sex in your game
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
